Uttara Kannada: High: Flash Floods, Landslides, Coastal Erosion; Moderate: Drought
Kodagu: High: Landslides, Flash Floods; Moderate: Severe Rainfall
Belagavi: High: Riverine Flooding (Krishna Basin); Moderate: Drought
Raichur: High: Severe Drought, Heatwaves; Moderate: Riverine Flooding
Bengaluru Urban: High: Urban Flooding, Infrastructure Collapse, Fire; Moderate: Earthquake
Dakshina Kannada: High: Coastal Flooding, Cyclones; Moderate: Landslides
Kalaburagi: High: Drought, Heatwaves; Moderate: Flash Flooding
Shivamogga: High: Flash Floods, Landslides; Moderate: Forest Fires
Udupi: High: Coastal Erosion, Heavy Rainfall Flooding; Moderate: Cyclones
Chikkamagaluru: High: Landslides, Flash Floods; Moderate: Forest Fires
